Class RandomHelper

java.lang.Object
java.util.Random
org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.RandomHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, RandomGenerator
public class RandomHelper extends Random
Helper-wrapper over standard Random to generate random arrays and collections
See Also:

      public int[] randomRangeArr(int lowBound, int highBound)
      Parameters:
      lowBound - lower bound of the range (inclusive)
      highBound - higher bound of the range (exclusive)
      Returns:
      the array of elements in range [ lowBound ; highBound ) that was shuffled

      public int[] shuffle(IntStream values)
      Collects the passed stream of ints into an array and shuffle it with shuffleArr(int[])
      Parameters:
      values - stream of primitive ints
      Returns:
      an array of inpiut elements that are shuffled

    • shuffleArr

      public void shuffleArr(int[] valuesArr)
      Swap elements of the passed array in random way. The number of swaps equals to the length of array.
      Parameters:
      valuesArr - an array to shuffle
